bibl.title: Objects from the Temple of Tutu.
bibl.note: Dakhleh Oasis Project - Excavations at Ismant el-Kharab (since 1991). - I. The Temple of Tutu (Ist-IVth cent. A.D.). - II. Objects from the Temple (sculptures, small objects, shrines, pedestals). - III. Observations. - Pp. 843-844: K.A. WORP, Appendix. An Enigmatic Inscription: Διοπολίτου (upon a pedestal).

bibl.title: Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part II

bibl.seg: HOPE Colin A., Objects from the Temple of Tutu.

Willy CLARYSSE, Antoon SCHOORS and Harco WILLEMS (Edd.), Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part II = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 85 (Leuven, 1998) pp. 803-858, 9 figg., 3 plans, 14 pll.

Dakhleh Oasis Project - Excavations at Ismant el-Kharab (since 1991). - I. The Temple of Tutu (Ist-IVth cent. A.D.). - II. Objects from the Temple (sculptures, small objects, shrines, pedestals). - III. Observations. - Pp. 843-844: K.A. WORP, Appendix. An Enigmatic Inscription: Διοπολίτου (upon a pedestal).
